name: SSF7
title: Site-Specific Factor 7
subtitle: Assessment Method of Distant (Mediastinal, Scalene) Nodal Status
notes:
**Note 1:**  The assessment results are recorded in **Site-Specific Factor 6, Distant (Mediastinal, Scalene) Nodal Status**.

**Note 2:**  Use the highest applicable code.
